item.title: London Hacker Olympics 2014
item.description: I recently attended the 2014 London Hacker Olympics and had a blast. Amidst meeting some amazing people and having a lot of fun, our team managed to get first (second actually, as it was 0 indexed) place, but only because it went into over time (even though it wasn’t a draw), but who’s bitter, right :). Either way, we won some awesome medals Here’s the score board at game close (we’re Minor Zeta): There was a lot of good competition and a lot of fluxuation on the scoreboard.
